About

My name is Josh Martin and and I'm a Chicago Designer focused on Branding and UI/UX. Learn more.

A detailed list of my work experience, endorsements, and proficiencies can be seen on my Linkedin and Resume.

I host my unabridged, visual portfolio on Dribbble and offer a brief, consolidated .pdf version for download.

For all other inquiries, I'm reachable via email.
